conclusion: Identify the forces on each segment of wire ABC in the magnetic fields.
Determine the magnetic force on each segment using F = BIL.
Calculate the force on segment AB: F_AB = BIL, direction upward.
Calculate the force on segment BC: F_BC = BIL, direction downward.
Resolve the forces into components; horizontal components cancel, vertical components add up.
Vertical component of force on AB is BIL sin(120°).
Vertical component of force on BC is BIL sin(120°).
Sum the vertical components: F_total = 2BIL sin(120°).
Substitute the sine value: F_total = BIL √3.
The magnitude of the Ampere force received by the wire is BIL √3.
